sentences.sContent: Further down the supply chain, garlic prices have jumped tenfold on wholesale markets in big cities and fourfold nationwide.
sentences.sContent_eng: Further down the supply chain, garlic prices have jumped tenfold on wholesale markets in big cities and fourfold nationwide.
sentences.sCn: 沿供应链向下，其大城市批发价格跳升十倍，而全国售价则上升四倍。

sentences.sContent: The "other" division, in which they are lumped with cloud services, grew nearly fourfold, but is still less than one-tenth of the top line.
sentences.sContent_eng: The "other" division, in which they are lumped with cloud services, grew nearly fourfold, but is still less than one-tenth of the top line.
sentences.sCn: 与云服务一同被归类到“其他”业务的部门增长近四倍，但营收仍不到总营收的十分之一。

sentences.sContent: Doubling hf-current results in a doubling of current density and a fourfold heat provided that the area of effective contact between the tissue ang the electrode remains constant.
sentences.sContent_eng: Doubling hf-current results in a doubling of current density and a fourfold heat provided that the area of effective contact between the tissue ang the electrode remains constant.
sentences.sCn: 如果人体组织和电极之间的有效接触面积保持不变，那么高频电流强度扩大一倍将会使电流密度增大一倍，并产生四倍的热量。

trans.tranOther: by or up to four times as many or as much
four times as much or as many
